## Fiddler crab body size in salt marshes from Florida to Massachusetts, USA at PIE and VCR LTER and NOAA NERR sites during summer 201

```{r}
library(lterdatasampler)
library(tidyverse)
```

```{r}

ggplot(data = pie_crab,
       aes(x = latitude, y = size)) +
  geom_jitter() +
  labs(title = "Fiddler crab graph",
       x = "Latitude",
       y = "Size")

```
